document.title: Hot Topic: Community Water Systems Required to Distribute Consumer Confidence Reports
document.abstract: A recent amendment to the Safe Drinking Water Act established the requirement for community water systems (CWS) to prepare a consumer confidence report (CCR) to distribute to their customers.
